subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Miami's dominant twosome, Dwyane Wade and Shaquille O'Neal, presented the Pistions with a no-win situation. The Heat have a 2-1 series lead.
snippet: Miami's dominant twosome, Dwyane Wade and Shaquille O'Neal, presented the Pistions with a no-win situation. The Heat have a 2-1 series lead.
